titleStmt.title: Spiritual vvisdom improved against temptation. In a sermon preached at Stepney Septemb. 16. 1660. And now made publick to obviate misrepresentation. By Matthew Meade.
titleStmt.author: Mead, Matthew, 1630?-1699.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Thomas Parkhurst, at the Three Crowns in the lower end of Cheapside overagainst [sic] the Great Conduit,
